title: Olympic Legacy: this was forever
creator_credit: Mark Aitken, Polkadotsonraindrops and First Light
brief_description: Set in East London, the location of the 2012 Olympics, this documentary follows a community’s battle to prevent their allotments being swallowed up in the development plans. This powerful film looks at what happens when a diverse group of people are united in despair about the effects of change.
